channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Network Security Management (NSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Network Security Management (NSM)

item.title: CVE-2020-7256|2024-08-04T09:25:48.956Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) Prior to 9.1 update 6 Mar 2020 Update allows attackers to unspecified impact via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-7336|2024-08-04T09:25:49.109Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross Site Request Forgery vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) prior to 10.1.7.35 and NSM 9.x prior to 9.2.9.55 may allow an attacker to change the configuration of the Network Security Manager via a carefully crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2020-7284|2024-08-04T09:25:48.430Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) prior to 10.1.7.7 allows local users to gain unauthorised access to the root account via execution of carefully crafted commands from the restricted command line interface (CLI).

item.title: CVE-2020-7258|2024-08-04T09:25:48.593Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) Prior to 9.1 update 6 Mar 2020 Update allows attackers to unspecified impact via unspecified vectors.
